name: Dexalot
description: Dexalot is an omni-chain order book DEX with zero slippage, near zero gas fees, and is on its own app-specific chain, allowing users to deposit from and withdraw to multiple chains. Dexalot is also fully on-chain and non-custodial.

missions.name: C-Chain Swaps
missions.description: Swap tokens on the C-chain using Dexalot's Simple Swap feature.

quests.name: Simple Swap on C-chain
quests.description: Use Simple Swap on the C-chain to exchange tokens.

tasks.name: Perform a Simple Swap
tasks.description: Complete a token swap on Dexalot using Simple Swap on C-chain.

badge.name: Dexalot Trader
badge.description: Awarded for completing any trade on Dexalot's on-chain order book and successfully transferring assets across the C-chain and Dexalot L1 subnet.

missions.name: Deposit and Trade
missions.description: Deposit assets on Dexalot's L1 subnet and trade on the on-chain order book.

quests.name: Deposit, Trade and Withdraw using Dexalot L1 and C-chain
quests.description: Deposit assets from C-chain into Dexalot L1, post and execute a limit or market order on Dexalot L1, and withdraw your counter asset from Dexalot L1 back to C-chain

tasks.name: Deposit from C-chain
tasks.description: Deposit assets from C-chain to Dexalot's L1 subnet.

tasks.name: Post and Execute Order
tasks.description: Post a limit or market order and execute a trade on the on-chain order book on Dexalot L1.

tasks.name: Perform Withdrawal
tasks.description: Withdraw your traded assets from Dexalot L1 back to the C-chain.

badge.name: Dexalot Trader
badge.description: Awarded for completing any trade on Dexalot's on-chain order book and successfully transferring assets across the C-chain and Dexalot L1 subnet.

missions.name: Purchase $GUN with USDC
missions.description: Purchase GUN tokens using USDC on the Simple Swap screen from C-chain, and have the GUN tokens automatically deposited in GUN L1.

quests.name: Buy GUN with USDC from C-chain
quests.description: Purchase GUN tokens using USDC on the Simple Swap screen from C-chain, and have the GUN tokens automatically deposited in GUN L1.

tasks.name: Purchase GUN
tasks.description: Use Simple Swap on C-chain to buy GUN with USDC, and receive the GUN tokens on GUN L1.

badge.name: Dexalot Trader
badge.description: Awarded for completing any trade on Dexalot's on-chain order book and successfully transferring assets across the C-chain and Dexalot L1 subnet.
